about_me.description: Hi there! I'm Noureddine, a dedicated software engineering student at 1337 Coding School & ALX Africa, eagerly pursuing a career in software engineering. My passion for technology fuels my drive to learn and grow, and I'm excited to put my skills into practice.

education_and_training.field_of_study: Network Administration and Information Systems Security

education_and_training.institution: UNIVERSITY DIPLOMA OF TECHNOLOGY - Cadi Ayyad University

language_skills.english: B2 (Independent user) in Listening, Reading, Spoken production, Spoken interaction, and Writing

projects.title: Minishell
projects.description: A mini implementation of bash in C. Learned about processes, file descriptors, parsing algorithms, and computer theory.

projects.title: Philosophers
projects.description: Modeling the Philosophers' Dinner problem using threads, mutex, semaphores, and child processes.

projects.title: C++ Modules
projects.description: 10 modules to deepen understanding of classes, polymorphisms, templates, casts, and containers in C++.

projects.title: Webserv
projects.description: Building a C++98-compatible HTTP web server from scratch, handling various HTTP requests and serving static and dynamic content.

projects.title: Inception
projects.description: System administration project using Docker to virtualize and manage multiple services (WordPress, MariaDB, and NGINX).

projects.title: ft_transcendence (Current)
projects.description: Developing a web application for real-time multiplayer Pong games using Django, implementing authentication with JWT, 2FA and OAuth2.
